Title: AI Enterprise Value: Real-World Applications | BRK334
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Explore how organizations are driving measurable business value with Microsoft Foundry on Windows and the Model Context Protocol (MCP) on Windows. See real-world examples from app developers, consulting firms, and enterprises building intelligent solutions that accelerate workflows and transform operations. Walk away with actionable insights to apply AI innovation in your own enterprise.
